title: Research Podcasts Platform
description: A Kubernetes microservices architecture that can scale and parallelize large amounts of RAG processing LLM pipelines using Kafka as a message broker. Start a researching query, which looks a publically available research from arXiv, and the system will generate a short form podcast episode using high quality text to speech; sending updates back to the client along the way.

title: Custom Bluesky feed in a home lab environment
description: A custom feed generator server with a docker PostgreSQL database for Bluesky posts relating to the Cosmere by Brandon Sanderson. Uses the Python atproto SDK. Orchestrates web, firehose, scheduler, and postgres services together in a home lab setup to serve the custome feed on Bluesky.

title: Web-based text-to-speech document reader
description: OpenReader WebUI is a dockerized web EPUB and PDF text to speech document reader app meant for use with external TTS API. Read documents in realtime with high-quality text-2-speech; or extract audiobooks. Use your own Kokoro FastAPI or Open AI API endpoint.

title: Analyzing the Effectiveness of Large Language Models on Text-to-SQL Synthesis
description: Investigating various approaches to using Large Language Models (LLMs) for Text-to-SQL program synthesis, focusing on the outcomes and insights derived. Employing the popular Text-to-SQL dataset, spider, the goal was to input a natural language question along with the database schema and output the correct SQL SELECT query.

title: Using Large Language Models for Text-to-SQL Synthesis
description: This project fine-tunes a local large language model (LLM) WizardCoder-15B with QLoRA on a custom Spider training dataset to create a Text-to-SQL LLM. The resultant model, achieves 61% execution accuracy, incorporating database context for validation.

title: TuneTidy iOS App
description: TuneTidy Native is a React Native iOS App that enhances the Spotify experience by enabling users to analyze their listening data and dynamically manage their playlists on the go. It also allows users to make AI generated Playlist Cover Art for their playlists.

title: TuneTidy Web App
description: TuneTidy is a React.js website that allows Spotify users to look at their listening data and organize their playlists by different criteria. The web app version of the iOS app.

title: Artificial Intelligence Research
description: Written in 2021 (before the AI craze). A research paper posing the question: Why are Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) Important for the Advancement of Artificial Intelligence?

title: Manacala Game GUI Application
description: Created with Qt Creator using C++.

title: Shoots and Ladders GUI Application
description: Created with Qt Creator using C++.
